name: 4minutes
description:
Guys, please play the game and fill me with criticism to improve my development, this was my first game and I don't intend to stop, my current goal is to participate in jam's to improve my development itself, so I would like all the criticism you can give me. Thanks for playing my game :)

If at the beginning of the game you can't move the camera without holding it, enter the pause menu and go back... and an error that I don't know how to solve at the moment.
